entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Text-To-Speech unable to override system's default voices #26853

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] ListView ContextActions in modal page #26854
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-modal

Merged

  • [Testing] Enable Catalyst UI Tests with Screenshot Verification #26829
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3

Updated

  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 64 #26823
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Android shadow performance #26789
    area-drawing, community ✨, .NET 9 SR4
  • [Windows] Tap Events Incorrectly passed Through Button - fix #26834
    platform/windows 🪟, p/0, community ✨, area-gestures, .NET 9 SR3
  • Fix ScrollToPosition.Center behavior in ScrollView on iOS and MacCatalyst #26825
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, partner/syncfusion
  • Change iOS SetNeedsLayout propagation mechanism #26629
    area-layout, community ✨, .NET 9 SR3
